summary: A very basic mod that changes the Skyrim theme song to the \"Sovngarde Chant\" cover song by Stephanie Young.  Enjoy!!  :)
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod because I finally got bored of hearing the Skyrim main theme, and I got curious to know what my own cover that I made from last year would sound like on the main menu.  I was quite pleased with what turned out, and figured maybe I would just make it into a mod.

I may end up adding more to this later on...perhaps changing the background picture as well...but for now, the audio will just speak for itself.  Thanks for listening, and for downloading all  my stuff.  I love all of you, really!  

EXAMPLES:

Amazing video for my cover song, by Tranceseraph:

[youtube]dziRHDulG3k[/youtube]

And the original video:

[youtube]GciezcH6BHM[/youtube]

Download here:
[url=http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/466464]LINK[/url]

Instrumental:
[url=http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/466559]LINK[/url]
author: Stephanie Young
